abstract: To accelerate the adoption of electronic health records, G.E. will offer doctors and hospitals interest-free loans and guarantee that its products will meet not-yet-determined government standards.
snippet: To accelerate the adoption of electronic health records, G.E. will offer doctors and hospitals interest-free loans and guarantee that its products will meet not-yet-determined government standards.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:33 p.m.  Clarifying G.E. comments on initial funding for health-records loan program in post and headline. While it is setting aside $2 billion for financing of health information technology, its initial commitment for loans to accelerate adoption of electronic health records is $100 million.

headline.main: G.E. Offers Loans for E-Health Record Purchases
